title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Laparoscopic Surgery Proficiency-Based Training (PBT) Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants can perform laparoscopic basic skills (hand-eye coordination, bimanual manipulation) with over 80% accuracy.
Participants pass the FLS standard suturing and knot-tying task within three attempts.
Participants plan and execute a distributed training schedule of at least three sessions per week to achieve a cumulative practice time of 15+ hours.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
